feed.title: Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 08:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.8°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -4.2°C
Wind: ENE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
